name: "Goodnight."
description:
A short kinetic novel about a nameless boy who expresses his thoughts under the gentle shine of the night sky.

Features:

  • <10 minutes
  • 1 Ending
  • Made in ~4 days

Warning:

While it's vague, the story does allude to mental health issues and deals  with grief/mourning.

Credits:

  • Art, writing, and programming: Fuwawuri
  • Music: Pocket Sound

My first visual novel and I made it just in time for the end of SuNoFes! It was a struggle for me to actually commit and finish something so I'm happy to be able to share this with everyone. If anything doesn't work correctly, please let me know!
